pkgmetadata.longdescription: # leftpadLeft pad a string in Python. Created to try out making a `pip` package and uploading it to the [Python Package Index (PyPI)](https://pypi.org/).Inspired by the [`left-pad` package on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/left-pad) which [broke parts of the internet](https://www.theregister.co.uk/2016/03/23/npm_left_pad_chaos/).# Install`pip install leftpad`# Usage```pythonfrom leftpad import left_padleft_pad("foo", 5)// => " foo"left_pad("foobar", 6)// => "foobar"left_pad(1, 2, '0')// => "01"left_pad(17, 5, 0)// => "00017"```## TestingRun `python -m doctest leftpad.py`.
